item.title: THE FAKE INDUSTRY
item.description: THE FAKE INDUSTRY: WHY WE SHOULD LOOK AT OURSELVES FIRST We’re all potential victims, but at the same time we may all be capable of deceit. Suppose you have inherited a painting and you have always been convinced that it was a work of art by Karel Appel. Or you bought it yourself. But now it turns out that it is not an apple, but a forgery. Nevertheless, you put that painting into circulation.
